tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilNutrientAnalysisResults (
  field_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  nitrogen float,
  phosphorus float,
  potassium float,
  calcium float,
  magnesium float
)

CREATE TABLE FieldDetails (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255),
    owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    crop_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE nutrient_analysis (
 analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 field_id INT,
 nitrogen DECIMAL,
 phosphorus DECIMAL,
 potassium DECIMAL,
 FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
 result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 analysis_id INT,
 sample_date DATE,
 ph DECIMAL,
 organic_matter DECIMAL,
 FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES nutrient_analysis(analysis_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Soil_Nutrient_Results (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 field_name VARCHAR(50),
 nitrogen FLOAT,
 phosphorus FLOAT,
 potassium FLOAT
 )

CREATE TABLE Field_Information (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 field_name VARCHAR(50),
 location VARCHAR(50),
 size FLOAT
 )

CREATE TABLE Nutrient_Categories (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 nutrient_name VARCHAR(50),
 optimal_range_min FLOAT,
 optimal_range_max FLOAT
 )

CREATE TABLE Analysis_Results (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 field_id INTEGER,
 nutrient_id INTEGER,
 value FLOAT,
 analysis_date DATE
 )

CREATE TABLE NutrientTests (
    test_id INT,
    test_date DATE,
    field_id INT,
    test_type VARCHAR,
    nutrient_level DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (test_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Fields(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FieldNutrientLevels (
    field_id INT,
    nutrient_id INT,
    nutrient_level DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (field_id, nutrient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Fields(field_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (nutrient_id) REFERENCES Nutrients(nutrient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FieldReports (
    report_id INT,
    field_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    summary TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (report_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Fields(field_id)
);
